snippet.title: Spirit Oath Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Early access is available from June 2nd 2020!
Add Spirit Oath to your wishlist:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/986070/Spirit_Oath/

Spirit Oath, an intense RTS inspired by board games, for PC. Use rune tiles to build the world around you and summon spirits to protect your core and fend off enemy hordes.

Social Media:
FB:https: //www.facebook.com/SpiritOath/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/TriangleSquar10
IG: https://www.instagram.com/spiritoath/?hl=en
